function.name: cooking_setCourse
function.description: This function is used to set a specific cooking course on an appliance without starting it.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device whose cooking course is being set.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment of the device whose cooking course is being set.

mode.description: The cooking mode to be set on the device.

predefinedMode.description: The cooking predefined mode to be set on the device.

temperatureUnit.description: The unit of temperature (e.g., Celsius, Fahrenheit).

cookingTemperature.description: The temperature to be set for the cooking course.

cookingTimer.description: The duration to be set for the cooking course.
